item.title: What's in a domain name?
item.description: For Kenton City Schools our original domain name was the standard kenton.k12.oh.us. Unfortunately, only techies could remember it correctly, so I registered kentoncityschools.org. I'm still kicking myself for not registering the .com version, it's since been picked up by domain squatter. :-( Kentoncityschools.org has served us â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
